title: Bug 7734: System can be shut down without savefile warnings
OB: When shutting down the system, there are no warnings or prompts regarding unsaved files or data.
EB: When shutting down the system, it should provide a dialog box with the message 'Do you want to save your file?', along with options 'Yes', 'No', and 'Cancel' (which will halt the shutdown).
SR: To reproduce the bug, perform a system shutdown without saving any open files or data.
